Title: Password Validity Check
Steps: Validate username includes [a-zA-Z0-9]+ | Check password has at least one uppercase letter; number; and special character | Ensure all parts are present in the password

Title: OTP Verification
Steps: Mobile number must be different from current email
Expected: Mobile number unique and different from email address.

Title: Redirect to Welcome Page
Expected: Redirected to welcome page after successful registration.
